Title: Charts for Asp.net MVC and WebForms - Libero API for FusionCharts
Description: Libero.FusionChartsAPI is made for Asp.Net (Webforms and MVC) developers to make easier to implement Fusion Charts in their projects.
HomeWiki:
Libero API is a helper that brings to you a straightforward and productive way to display fusion charts in your ASP.Net projects.

Charts supported so far:

Demos

ASP.Net Webforms
  • Single Series Chart, adding data by DataSource.
  • Single Series Chart, adding data manually.
  • Multi Series Chart, adding data by DataSource.
  • Multi Series Chart, adding data manually.
  • AJAX sample.

ASP.Net MVC
  • Setting up for a MVC project.
  • Single Series Chart, adding data by DataSource - MVC.
  • Single Series Chart, adding data manually - MVC.
  • Multi Series Chart, adding data by DataSource - MVC.
  • Multi Series Chart, adding data manually - MVC.
  • AJAX sample - MVC.

General
  • Creating a custom template.

Project Description
Libero.FusionChartsAPI is made for Asp.Net (Webforms and MVC) developers to make easier to implement Fusion Charts in their projects.

Fusion Charts are flash charts generated based on XML, it is also a free product available at www.fusioncharts.com/free where you may get much more information about their product.
